content.title: Project portfolio
content.description: This web app, which you are currently visting, was built to showcase some of my personal developer projects. From deisgning modern web-apps to color space conversion, and all therein.

content.title: Youtube playlist saver
content.description: An intuitive web app built with JavaScript, Node, and Express. Allows for easy backup of the user's playlists, utilizing the Google and Youtube Data APIs, featuring clean and readable code.

content.title: Spotify playlist saver
content.description: A Python-built web app utilizing Flask and Jinja. Gathers user playlists, leveraging the Spotify API, and allows for their backup. Includes documentation, in and out of code, and Docker setup.

content.title: Hue lamp app
content.description: This GUI app was built using Python's Tkinter module. It serves as an interface to control a HUE lamp through a local HUE Bridge API. I delved into implemention of color space conversions.
